thread.title: Reports: 'Game of Thrones' actor Neil Fingleton dies

author: USA TODAY Life
title: Reports: 'Game of Thrones' actor Neil Fingleton dies
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Reports: 'Game of Thrones' actor Neil Fingleton dies He played basketball and held record for being U.K.'s tallest man. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Reports: 'Game of Thrones' actor Neil Fingleton dies Lorena Blas , USA TODAY Life 6:47   Neil Fingleton appeared on HBO's 'Game of Thrones.' (Photo: Helen Sloan, HBO) 17 CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Neil Fingleton, who played Mag the Mighty on HBO's Game of Thrones , has died, according to TMZ . 
The former basketball player, 36, who stood 7 feet 7 inches tall, died Saturday, the celebrity news site said. Fingleton, said to be the tallest person in the U.K., played high school and college basketball in the United States. The cause of death is unknown. 
Kenneth Earle, Fingleton's agent, said he was a "gentle giant," Sky News reported. 
Neil Fingleton #42 of Team East makes a slam dunk during the McDonald's High School All-American game against Team West at The Fleet Center in Boston. (Photo: Jamie Squire, Getty Images) 
After he turned from basketball to acting, he also appeared in X-Men First Class , Doctor Who and 47 Ronin . 
Ian Whyte, who played another giant on Thrones , offered his condolences on Twitter, saying "Very sad to hear of the tragic passing of Neil Fingleton. He followed his dreams." Very sad to hear of the tragic passing of Neil Fingleton. He followed his dreams. â€” Ian Whyte (@Ian_Whyte) February 26, 2017 Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2lK8M7u NEVER MISS OUT Life Be a pop culture maven. We're sorry.
